name: post-to-lemmies
description: A cross-browser extension to Post lemmies in a few clicks

scripts.sass: npx node-sass css/postlemmy.dark.scss styles.dark.css && npx node-sass css/postlemmy.scss styles.css && npx css-minify -f styles.dark.css && npx css-minify -f styles.css && mv css-dist/* popup/. && rm *.css
